attributes.additional_details:
We pledge to move towards a more federalised United Kingdom with certain matters devolved to the regions.

An English Parmiament located not in London could have power to run English only matters. Removing it from London would spread the power around the country so as to avoid corruption and reliance on London. It would create jobs and a sense of inclusion for the rest of the country and lead to a fairer and equitable state of affairs for the people of England.

I am English, born in Essex, live in London and I believe in constitutional chnage to bring about a fairer deal for the people of England.
